DOC.brief_summary: The hypothesis study concentration fluoride oral interproximal fluid would increase use high-viscosity GIC pit fissure sealant , compare Resin-Based sealant contain fluoride RB sealant without fluoride content . DOC.brief_title: Fluoride Concentration Inter-proximal Fluid From Dental Sealants
DOC.criteria: The inclusion criterion : year birth 2000 2002 , inform consent sign parents/guardians , presence least two permanent first molar completely erupt . The exclusion criterion : demineralize lesion hypomineralized permanent molar , carious lesion presence fill occlusal surface first permanent molar , fix orthodontic treatment .
